snippet.title: Castlevania Resurrection Official E3 Video Game Demo Movie & Music by Konami
snippet.description:
OST Official Soundtrack Demos Released:
http://soundcloud.com/greyling/sets/castlevania-resurrection-ost/

More video game (and film/video) music at: http://marklindsey.info

This is a Castlevania Resurrection (Dreamcast) demo movie I did original music and SFX for when I worked at Konami around 1999 (using a lot of my own gear).

Video copyright Konami - Posted for demonstration purposes only.

Animators: Contact me and I'll add your name to the credits here (I can't remember all of you).
